title: Should I buy a used mobile phone or a new one? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, it is advisable to buy second hand mobile phones but these things should be kept in mind before buying a second hand smartphone. First of all, you have to see that the phone you are buying is completely safe for personal data security and protection from any kind of bugs, which are placed just inside the mat to get your bank details. is. The next thing you need to see is that no original parts have been removed. If the person you are buying from is not very technical, then you can check it only by phone. just think. Also Check:- Is it safe to buy unboxed/refurbished phones online?Is it a good idea to buy refurbished mobile device?If you definitely want to buy a second-hand phone, check these things out: Ask the owner to provide you with the original bill and ensure that your phone's IMEI is also printed on the bill. Check for physical damage, loose back cover, ball battery, etc. See if the owner is ready to give you the phone with the original box packing and the original charger with USB cable and headphones. If not, calculate what you will have to spend to buy a new charger / USB cable and headphones. Check the camera, the sound quality of the speaker (play some songs and check). Make some calls and ask the person you are talking to if your voice is clear. Check for any disturbances or delays in launching the application. See if the USB cable fits the charging port correctly, check if it is loose and also check the headphone jack. From the moment you start checking the phone, keep an eye on the percentage of the battery, after you have done all the tests, see how bad the battery is if it looks unusual, do not call or bargain.

What is the difference between a new phone and a used phone? First of all, the new phone is naturally new in appearance, new in packaging, new in accessories. In short, all aspects are new, there are no scratches and no wear marks, and the new Apple iPhone has a one-year warranty service. For users with cleanliness, this is very good choice. But the cost given at the same time is expensive.  What is the used Apple iPhone? The price is low, there is no configuration, there is a wear scar, and there is a high probability that there is no warranty service, but the price is also relatively low. Take Apple iPhone X, the new iPhone is up to $950, You can find the price at CellphoneAge. And in the second-hand market, the price is almost halved, the appearance may be a little more expensive, but almost half the price to buy Apple iPhone X is a more cost-effective. Whether it is worth buying a used phone is entirely based on personal choice. As far as I am concerned, I don’t have any obstacles in buying used mobile phones, so I think it is a really cost-effective choice to buy a used phone.
